thread.title: Swansea forward Andre Ayew available after knee injury for visit of Stoke
thread.title_full: Swansea forward Andre Ayew available after knee injury for visit of Stoke

title: Swansea forward Andre Ayew available after knee injury for visit of Stoke
text:
18:10 CET Swansea forward Andre Ayew available after knee injury for visit of Stoke - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Andre Ayew is set to overcome a knee problem and feature for Swansea in their Barclays Premier League home game against Stoke on Monday. 
Wideman Ayew took a bang to the knee in Swansea’s last game – against Tottenham two weeks ago – and withdrew from the Ghana squad for their friendly against Canada last week. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
